title: HOW it is happend?
body:
Hello everybody Warriors, hoping to get a satisfactory answer.
I just have five days no login account, and then i got the news that my account was blocked.
I play for a long time, the system will determine the final play is not my own, what is this shit?
It really makes me very angry.
ffffff{{item:2045}}

replies.body:
Your account was picked up by our elo boosting detection and had the standard penalties applied. For more info on what is considred elo boosting and the penalties see here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751834-MMR-Elo-Boosting
